title: Does ELO get me egirls
body:
Approaches girl " hi I'm diamond"

I'm curious ðŸ¤”ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

replies.body: I am a girl myself (not a egirl sorry to crush ur dreams) but I'd suggest letting them pick what role they want or just bribe them with rp. (rp would totally win me over tbh)
Pretty sure RP would win almost anyone over.
Someone's giving out free RP? What must I do?
Wow, i was really hoping for free rp :(
i can change my e-gender if you want me to {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Nope, Look at this poor soul...

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/3QGEowPx-willing-to-carry-any-girl-to-diamond-via-duo

No, you tell them 

"Diamond diamond in the sky, I know just what you need.
Sturdy diamond that you seek, glittering diamond of your dream. 
Look no further oh honey, It's none other than humble me.
Diamond diamond in the sky, you are in the sky with me."

Works all the time, no test run needed.

If you want egirls you need emonies.

That's the only way.

Well I got D1 and it didn't work
Although I'm not 6'4" and don't row for U.C. Davis
